error_202: Transaction is denied. Please try again or use another payment method.
error_400: Transaction cannot be processed. Please make sure you have entered the correct payment details.
error_502: We are having issues connecting to the payment provider. Please try again.
error_407: Your order are no longer available.
error_500: We are experiencing some unexpected system error. Please try again.
error_others: Transaction is unsuccesful. Please try again with another card or with a different payment method.
The connection failed because the networ: The connection failed because the network connection was lost.
The connection failed because the device: The connection failed because the device is not connected to the internet.
The connection failed because a call is: The connection failed because a call is active.
The connection failed because data use i: The connection failed because data use is currently not allowed on the device.
Make sure payment has been completed wit: Make sure payment has been completed within the GO-JEK app.
